item.title: Universal Digital Signage
item.description: This project is in progress, the content below was created before the project began and changes have occured during the development. Think of this as the pseudo-code of the project. The current installation instructions are available in the Documentation section on the website: Universal Digital Signage: Install and Setup. Description: This will be a device independent solution: the only configuration of the devices and screensavers that should be required is a URL to the server.
